String.String: Leslie Clark must kill 110 enemies over the course of «The Unlucky Day» mission.
Reaper's Fury
No Time for Sightseeing
Reach the cave entrance in less than 6 minutes in «The Unlucky Day» mission.
Uncle Simon's Lucky Boys
Find all the Marauders without letting any of them die in «The Unlucky Day» mission on Normal difficulty.
Steel Reapers
Kill Khaat in the «Big Game Hunters» mission without the heroes' health falling below 50%.

Instances.Id: TGH_Mis2_2 - That wasn't in the Contract

String.String: That Was Not in the Contract
Complete the «Big Game Hunters» mission without killing any Tyrant.
Who Needs the Economy…
Complete the «Big Game Hunters» mission by training no more than 12 SCVs on Normal difficulty.
Repair Team
Repair 2 Labs' entrances within 60 seconds of each other in the «Uninvited Guests» mission.
An Ardent Conservative
Complete the «Uninvited Guests» mission without training Cyclones.

Instances.Id: TGH_Mis3_3 - Who Is The Aggressor Here?

String.String: So Who Is the Aggressor Here?
Destroy the main Tal'darim base in the «Uninvited Guests» mission on Normal difficulty.
Fighting the Competition
Destroy the Night Furies' base in the «Lair of Death» mission.
Kill the Super Mutants before they kill anyone in the «Lair of Death» mission.
No Bite, Only Bark
Straight Ahead!
Complete the «Lair of Death» mission on Normal difficulty without Infestation Level going above 10.
Complete «The Proof of the Power» mission without the Psi-link Spires taking any damage.
Do Not Touch It!
Complete «The Proof of the Power» mission without losing more than 6 units.
Admiral - Savior
Untouchable
Complete «The Proof of the Power» mission without Tolaris’ health falling below 100% on Normal difficulty.
Storm Warning
Kill 150 enemies with High Templars during the «Among the Shadows» mission.
Strength in Unity
Destroy any Zerg Infestation while fighting alongside with the La’ziot in the «Among the Shadows» mission.
Destroy 3 Virophages before the third Infested Wave appears in the «Among the Shadows» mission on Normal difficulty.
Fatal Blow
Kill the Noxious Ultralisk with a Replicant that has turned into a copy of it in the «A New Threat» mission.
Only One Will Remain...
Destroy 15 Zerg structures while defending the Warp Conduit in the «A New Threat» mission.
This Is Your Destiny...
Byron Kane must not die during the «A New Threat» mission on Normal difficulty.
Destroy all the Artifact Hunters’ Command Centers in «The Impending Darkness» mission.
Hunting the Hunters
Jewelry Work
Avalax must not die during «The Impending Darkness» mission.
Complete «The Impending Darkness» mission without destroying any Wild Creatures’ nest on Normal difficulty.
Wildlife Conservation
Attack of the Titans
At least 2 Stone Zealots must survive the assault of the Quantum Node in «The Dark Citadel» mission.
Immortal Punishers
Make all the upgrades in the Warp Gate in «The Dark Citadel» mission.

Instances.Id: RwD_Mis5_3 - We Strike From the Shadows

String.String: We Strike From the Shadows
Destroy 3 Quantum Nodes within 100 seconds of each other in «The Dark Citadel» mission on Normal difficulty.
Wrath of the Thenebral
Playing as the La'ziot faction, destroy the main Taldarion's base before you join 3 allies in the «Between Two Fires» mission.
Admiral's Composure
Dark Archons must take control of 30 enemy units in the «Between Two Fires» mission.
Profitable Investment
Join 4 La'ziot camps over the course of the «Between Two Fires» mission on Normal difficulty.
Nerazim Tactics
At least 2 Void Crystals must be destroyed by the Wild Zerg in the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 1)» mission.
Destroy the main traitors' base in the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 1)» mission.
La'ziot Retribution
Complete the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 1)» mission on Normal difficulty without killing Nemezith.
Avoiding the Troubles

Instances.Id: RwD_Mis8_1 - Now Let's Play by My Rules

String.String: Now Let's Play by My Rules
Reach level 10 with Avalax in the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 2)» mission.
Death's Advisor
Kill all the Tal'darim in the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 2)» mission.

Instances.Id: RwD_Mis8_3 - Not Looking for Easy Ways

String.String: Complete the «Twilight of Talaad (Part 2)» mission on Normal difficulty without capturing a single La'ziot Factory.
Not Looking for Easy Ways
Thirsting for Power
Complete the bonus objective in less than 4 minutes after building a base in «The True Destiny» mission.
Kill all the Zerg near your ally in «The True Destiny» mission.
Helping Hand
Strength in Scarcity
Complete the main objective in «The True Destiny» mission on Normal difficulty without your supply limit going above 80.
Junker Hunters
Make all the upgrades for your allies in «The Failed Project» mission.
What About Plan B?
The ships of your allies must not be destroyed during «The Failed Project» mission.
Dealing with Parasites
Find and destroy all the Nydus Worms in «The Failed Project» mission on Normal difficulty.
Complete «The Dark Deal» mission without losing more than 10 units.
One Man, No Man

Instances.Id: SotP_Mis1_2 - No One Will Stop Me

String.String: No One Will Stop Me
Complete the bonus objective in less than 5 minutes after being released from the test chamber in «The Dark Deal» mission.

Instances.Id: SotP_Mis1_3 - I Can Handle It Myself!

String.String: Complete «The Dark Deal» mission on Normal difficulty without letting the Zerg out of the pens.
I Can Handle It Myself!
Heed the Call
Complete the «A New Ally» mission without destroying any Zerg structure.
March of the Dead
Summon at least 100 Infested Terrans during the «A New Ally» mission.
Destroy the main Eledis' base in the «A New Ally» mission on Normal difficulty in less than 20 minutes.
Lightning - Fast Attack
Network Outages
Destroy the Purifiers' Power Cores before the Artifact Transport reaches the third Power Node in the «With Fire and Fury» mission.
Professional Bodyguards
Complete the «With Fire and Fury» mission without Artifact Transport’s health falling below 80%.

String.String: Don't Stand in My Way...
Destroy all the Purifiers' structures in the «With Fire and Fury» mission on Normal difficulty.

Collect 500 minerals in excess of what is needed in the «Breaking The Chains» mission.
Fast And Furious
Complete the first part of the bonus objective in less than 8 minutes in the «Breaking The Chains» mission.

Instances.Id: SotP_Mis4_3 - In the Thick of Things

String.String: In the Thick of Things
Don't let the enemy heroes destroy any allies during their first attack in the «Breaking The Chains» mission on Normal difficulty.
The Kaldir's Butcher
Destroy the Artifact Hunters' base on the first glacier before activating your base in the «Ice Wastelands» mission.
The Second Guardian
Find and kill the Xarmat's second guardian in the «Ice Wastelands» mission.
SotP_Mis5_3
Freezed Production
Reach the cave entrance in the «Ice Wastelands» mission on Normal difficulty without morphing Larvae.
A Bomb Truck
Kill 125 enemies with Banelings during «The Hunt Continues» mission.
Destroy 4 Infested Nests before they mutate in «The Hunt Continues» mission.
The Truth is Waiting
Activate the first Sanctuary in less than 20 minutes after taking your base in «The Hunt Continues» mission on Normal difficulty.
Complete the first section of the «Forced Measures» mission without losing more than 5 Nerazim units.
Defender of the Oppressed
Find and gather all the resources in the first section of the «Forced Measures» mission.
A Gang of Robbers
Revenge of the Prisoners
Reach the Temple without hiring reinforcements in the «Forced Measures» mission on Normal difficulty.
A Dirty Trick
Kill Eledis while he is capturing a Projector in the «A Spark of Hope» mission.

Instances.Id: SotP_Mis8_2 - You Had a Head Start

String.String: Don't let Eledis control more than one Projector at the same time in the «A Spark of Hope» mission.
You Had a Head Start
Byron Kane must not die during the «A Spark of Hope» mission on Normal difficulty.
An Experienced Strategist
A Perfect Ritual
Complete the «A Noble Sacrifice» mission without Tolaris taking any damage.
Ambulance Service
The Nydus Worms on your allies' bases must not be destroyed during the «A Noble Sacrifice» mission.
Scorched Earth
Don't let any Zerg Hatchery be morphed in the «A Noble Sacrifice» mission on Normal difficulty.
The Dark Revenger
Tolaris must kill 200 enemies over the course of «The Last Thenebral» mission.
Defective Product

A Harmless Shadow
